summary: A collection of custom Ansible action plugins used in Windows integration tests. One plugin handles copying files or archives to a Windows host, managing temporary extraction, checksum validation, and cleanup. The other extends the reboot functionality by detecting the Windows version, choosing the correct shutdown command, and optionally running test commands after a reboot.
business_intent: Enable reliable and automated deployment of test artifacts and controlled reboot operations on Windows machines during Ansible integration testing, improving test consistency across different Windows versions.
